name: ASYT
description:
ASYT is a casual game about a ball who loves to charge into electrical balls to see what happens. 

SPACEBAR to hold and release charge, MOUSE to aim.

Features
  • Procedurally generated levels!
  • Cool visuals!
  • Cool music!
  • A timer for your run!
  • Charge into random electrical balls, what else could you want?
Credits

This is a game jam prototype created for Ryan's Li'l Jam V2, thank you to Ryan for hosting this jam!

Dmytro Nebesh - Composer, SFX
